alert.note: Alert for Larimer County Below 6000 Feet, Northwest Weld County; Northeast Weld County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 19 at 11:42PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Weld County through 1215 AM MDT... At 1142 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 6 miles northeast of Purcell, or 22 miles northeast of Greeley, moving north at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Grover and Hereford. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Larimer County Below 6000 Feet, Northwest Weld County; Northeast Weld County
